title: Safety Travelling Tips, Nottingham Edition
text:

So you decide to forego the option of getting a rental car (maybe you cannot drive, or maybe you just prefer to not drive) and choose instead to use public transportation like the buses and taxis in Nottingham. It is definitely a good and, by far, the cheaper idea. But, before you go hop into a bus or any taxi, you have to be aware of a few, simple things.Watch for your safety First!Do you have insurance? Well, the question is because you must have insurance, and it is not that you are expecting anything wrong to happen, but it never hurts to be on the safe side. Am I right? Also, make sure that you keep your personal belongings safe at all the time. Nottingham is a relatively safe and secure place. However, it never hurts to be on the safe side, and as much as possible, wear less jewellery and ornaments. Keep your wallet and all your valuables with your person at all times. Also, make sure you have emergency number stored in your phone. Speaking of phones, make sure that you have fully charged your devices before leaving your hotel.Plan your trip far before executing itIt never hurts to have a plan. Knowing where you are going, and planning out your trip is much better than just heading out with just a slight idea of where you want to go. Keep an itinerary and make sure you understand the roads you will be travelling on. Try to memorize the road, if you can. This will save you on taxi fare. It will also show you which bus route to take if you want to use the bus. This will also allow you to maximize your time, instead of wandering around lost and confused. Choose the best mode on the StreetsWhen waiting for buses or taxis make sure you prefer the taxis, as they are quick and great way to travel Nottingham. It keeps you away from the hassle to wait for the buses and trams. Also, they are easy to arrange a taxi ride over the phone rather than waiting alone outside. While taxis in Nottingham are regulated and registered, it does not hurt to make sure that the taxi you are getting in to have a valid license plate at the back. However, to ensure your safety and wellbeing, always book your hatchback with the known and rated taxis in the Nottingham. You can book them online before you start your journey, or you can call them immediately while you have arrived at the airport. The services are not only quick, but also very economical instead of others. Always be aware of your surroundings and keep your GPS on, as the taxi will locate you with your GPS. At your HotelNever leave your valuables in your hotel. Double check if fire alarms and smoke detector are working. Look for the fire extinguisher as soon as possible. As soon as you have settled yourself, make sure you know where the fire and emergency exits are. Before leaving your hotel, double check to make sure you have turned off all your devices, the faucets, and even the lights.
